articles.author: Tatiana Bautzer, Saeed Azhar
articles.description: Citigroup (C.N) CEO Jane Fraser announced a major management reorganizationon Wednesday that will result in more job cuts and give her more direct oversight over its businesses as she seeks to simplify the bank's structure.
articles.title: Citigroup CEO sets sweeping management changes, job cuts

articles.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh
articles.description: Apple's iPhone 15 drew mixed reactions in its third largest market of China on Wednesday, with many online users liking its faster chip and improved gaming capabilities while others preferred Huawei's new smartphone.
articles.title: Apple and Huawei's smartphone rivalry divides China

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: United Auto Workers (UAW) union President Shawn Fain said on Wednesday that progress is slow as talks continue with the Detroit Big Three automakers, just a day before four-year labor deals covering 146,000 U.S. workers are set to expire.
articles.title: UAW president: lot of work remaining to reach auto labor deals

articles.author: Miguel Lo Bianco, Jorge Otaola
articles.description: Argentina's annual inflation rate shot up to 124.4% in August after a sharp devaluation of the peso currency, with a 12.4% rise in the month the fastest since 1991, which is driving a painful cost-of-living crisis in the South American country.
articles.title: Argentine inflation hits 124% as cost-of-living crisis spreads

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Google parent Alphabet (GOOGL.O) is laying off employees from its global recruiting team as the tech giant continues to slow hiring, it said on Wednesday.
articles.title: Alphabet lays off hundreds from global recruitment team

articles.author: David French
articles.description: CrownRock LP is preparing to explore a sale that could value it at well over $10 billion including debt, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the largest deal for a U.S. oil and gas producer going back at least three years.
articles.title: US oil and gas producer CrownRock to explore $10 bln-plus sale -sources

articles.author: Patrick Wingrove
articles.description: Moderna (MRNA.O) on Wednesday said its flu vaccine had generated a stronger immune response against all four A and B strains of the influenza virus compared to traditional flu shots in a late-stage trial, sending shares up about 6% in early trading.
articles.title: Moderna flu shot succeeds in late-stage study

articles.author: Special Reports
articles.description: Indian parents whose children died after taking toxic syrups want justice. Some of the drugmakers haven’t shown they even tested their products.
articles.title: Cough syrup killed scores of children. Why no one has been held

articles.author: Lucia Mutikani
articles.description: U.S. consumer prices increased by the most in 14 months in August as the cost of gasoline surged, but the annual rise in underlying inflation was the smallest in nearly two years, likely giving the Federal Reserve cover to leave interest rates unchanged next Wednesday.
articles.title: Gasoline lights up US consumer inflation; underlying trend steadily improving

articles.author: Tom Balmforth
articles.description: Ukraine said it struck Russian naval targets and port infrastructure early on Wednesday in the Crimean city of Sevastopol, in what appeared to be the biggest attack of the war on the home of the Russian navy's Black Sea Fleet.
articles.title: Ukraine hits Russian naval targets in major Crimea attack
